welcome_modal.title: Category 1 Level 4
welcome_modal.text: In the fourth level, the hero gains a new ability - using the lever. He would need this ability to deactivate the traps in the road and to open the door.

finish_modal.title: All tasks completed!
finish_modal.text: You have successfully learned the ability to use a lever with a hero. The next level follows.

introduction_modal.title: The first task assignment
introduction_modal.text: The road to the first stone button is blocked by several barrels and closed doors. Destroy the barrels and use the lever.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your first task!
success_modal.text: Your first algorithm at this level allowed the hero to chop the barrels standing in the path and open the door using the lever.

introduction_modal.title: The second task assignment
introduction_modal.text: In this role the hero awaits a longer journey, which includes jumping, destroying boxes and circumventing traps.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your second task!
success_modal.text: Well done! Your second algorithm allowed the hero to successfully reach the target and overcome all obstacles.

introduction_modal.title: The third task assignment
introduction_modal.text: The hero's path is blocked by two successive traps that cannot be avoided. Fortunately, the levers to turn them off are nearby, use them.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your third task!
success_modal.text: In your third algorithm, you used both levers and so the hero successfully overcomes a dangerous obstacle.

introduction_modal.title: The fourth task assignment
introduction_modal.text: And this is the last task of this level, in which the door must be opened again. Open with the lever behind the vase.

success_modal.title: Well done! You've completed your fourth task!
success_modal.text: You have proven that using the lever is as easy for you as jumping and sword swinging.
